title: Food Menu
description: Traditional British pub food at The Anchor

items.name: Chicken Goujon Wrap with Chips
items.description: Crispy chicken goujons in a wrap with salad & chips.

items.name: Fish Finger Wrap with Chips
items.description: Golden fish fingers in a soft wrap with salad & chips.

items.name: Chips
items.description: Skin-on chips fried to order and finished with sea salt.

items.name: Chunky Chips
items.description: Thick-cut pub chips with a fluffy centre and crisp exterior.

items.name: Cheesy Chips
items.description: Golden chips under a blanket of melted mature cheddar.

items.name: Sweet Potato Fries
items.description: Lightly spiced sweet potato fries, perfect for sharing.

items.name: 6 Onion Rings
items.description: Beer-battered onion rings with a satisfying crunch.

categories.title: Snack Pots
categories.description: Enjoy our snack pots with chips and your choice of dip. Perfect for a cosy snack, quick bite, or smaller appetites including children.

items.name: 4 Chicken Goujons with Chips
items.description: Crispy chicken strips with chips and your choice of dip.

items.name: 5 Salt & Chilli Squid with Chips
items.description: Lightly spiced squid bites with chips and a zingy dip.

items.name: 3 Fish Fingers with Chips
items.description: Hand-cut fish fingers in breadcrumbs served with chips and lemon.

items.name: Beef & Ale Pie
items.description: Tender slow-cooked beef in a hearty ale gravy, wrapped in golden pastry. Served with buttery mash and seasonal vegetables.

items.name: Chicken Katsu Curry
items.description: Crispy breaded chicken served on fluffy rice, smothered in aromatic katsu curry sauce. A fusion of British and Japanese flavours.

items.name: Chicken & Wild Mushroom Pie
items.description: Succulent chicken and wild mushrooms in a creamy sauce, encased in flaky pastry. Served with smooth mash and fresh seasonal veg.

items.name: Sausage & Mash
items.description: Three juicy sausages on creamy mash, topped with crispy onions and rich gravy. A comforting British classic, full of flavour.

items.name: Lamb Shank
items.description: Slow-cooked lamb shank, served with smooth mash (contains dairy) or chunky chips (dairy-free option) and seasonal veg. Finished with a rich mint-infused gravy.
items.notes: Ask for chunky chips instead of mash for dairy-free option

items.name: Spinach & Ricotta Cannelloni
items.description: Pasta tubes filled with creamy ricotta and spinach, baked in rich tomato sauce. Served with garlic bread and crisp mixed salad.

items.name: Lasagne
items.description: Layers of pasta, rich meat sauce, and creamy b√©chamel, baked until golden. Served with crisp salad and warm garlic bread.

items.name: Mac 'N Cheese
items.description: Creamy macaroni in a rich cheese sauce, topped with crispy onions. Served with garlic bread and fresh salad for extra indulgence.

sections.title: Classic Chip Shop Favourites
sections.description: All served with mushy peas, tartar sauce, and fresh lemon

items.name: Fish & Chips
items.description: Beer-battered fish, crispy golden chips, mushy peas, tartar sauce, and a fresh lemon wedge for a classic taste.

items.name: Half Fish & Chips
items.description: Half-sized battered fish with chunky chips, mushy peas, tartar sauce, and a fresh lemon wedge‚Äîlight but satisfying.

items.name: Scampi & Chips
items.description: Golden, crispy scampi served with chunky chips, mushy peas, tartar sauce, and a fresh lemon wedge for balance.

items.name: Jumbo Sausage & Chips
items.description: Jumbo sausage with chunky chips, mushy peas, and your choice of sauce‚Äîperfect for a hearty, no-fuss meal.

items.name: Bisto Gravy
items.description: Proper gravy to soak your roast or chips.

items.name: Mayonnaise
items.description: Classic creamy mayo for dipping.

items.name: Garlic Mayonnaise
items.description: House garlic mayo with a gentle warmth.

items.name: Ketchup
items.description: Tomato ketchup, a chip shop staple.

items.name: English Mustard
items.description: Sharp English mustard for a proper kick.

items.name: Tartar Sauce
items.description: Tangy tartar sauce with capers and herbs.

items.name: Mint Sauce
items.description: Cool mint sauce to cut through rich roasts.

items.name: Cranberry Sauce
items.description: Sweet cranberry relish for turkey and cheese.

categories.title: Burgers
categories.description: Our burgers are all served with salad, chips and the sauce of your choice.

items.name: Beef Burger
items.description: Classic beef patty with all the trimmings

items.name: Spicy Chicken Burger
items.description: Crispy coated chicken with a spicy kick

items.name: Chicken Burger
items.description: Juicy grilled chicken breast

items.name: Vegetable Burger
items.description: Plant-based patty packed with flavour

sections.title: Burger Specials
sections.description: All of our special burgers are served with chips as standard.

items.name: Katsu Chicken Burger
items.description: Crispy chicken fillet topped with rich katsu curry sauce, fresh cucumber, and golden chips. A bold twist!

items.name: Beef Stack
items.description: Double beef patties, fresh salad, crispy onion ring, and golden chips. Customise with cheese or bacon!

items.name: Spicy Chicken Stack
items.description: Crispy, spicy chicken with fresh salad, a crunchy hash brown, and golden chips. Add your favourite sauce!

items.name: Chicken Stack
items.description: Breaded chicken fillet, crisp salad, hash brown, and golden chips. A hearty choice‚Äîperfect with sauce!

items.name: Veggie Stack
items.description: A tasty veggie patty with fresh salad, a crispy onion ring, and golden chips. A satisfying meat-free treat!

items.name: BBQ Sauce
items.description: Smoky barbecue glaze made for goujons and burgers.

items.name: Burger Sauce
items.description: Creamy burger sauce with a tangy edge.

items.name: Sweet Chilli Dipping Sauce
items.description: Sweet chilli sauce with a gentle heat.

categories.title: Stone Baked Pizza
categories.description: Enjoy the comforting taste of our stone-baked pizzas, crafted to order with authentic Italian ingredients. All pizzas can be made with 12" gluten-free bases at no extra charge - just ask when ordering! Small pizzas perfect for children.

items.name: Rustic Classic
items.description: Rich tomato sauce, creamy mozzarella, crisp stone-baked crust‚Äîa timeless favourite. Available with gluten-free base.

items.name: Simply Salami
items.description: Napoli salami, tangy tomato sauce, mozzarella, stone-baked to crispy perfection. Available with gluten-free base.

items.name: Fully Loaded
items.description: Napoli salami, speck ham, fennel salami, mozzarella on a bold stone-baked base. Available with gluten-free base.

items.name: Nice & Spicy
items.description: 'Nduja, Ventricina, roquito peppers, mozzarella‚Äîfiery flavours on a crisp crust. Available with gluten-free base.

items.name: The Garden Club
items.description: Roasted courgettes, caramelised onions, rocket, and mozzarella on a rich tomato base. Available with gluten-free base.

items.name: Smoked Chilli Chicken
items.description: Smoky paprika base with chicken, mozzarella, and roquito peppers for a spicy-savoury bite. Available with gluten-free base.

items.name: Chicken & Pesto
items.description: Tender chicken, basil pesto, and melted mozzarella on a crisp, stone-baked crust. Available with gluten-free base.

items.name: Barbecue Chicken
items.description: Sweet and smoky BBQ sauce, succulent chicken, speck ham, and mozzarella on a crunchy crust. Available with gluten-free base.

items.name: Speck Ham & Parmesan
items.description: Thinly sliced speck ham, shaved parmesan, and mozzarella on rich tomato sauce. Available with gluten-free base.

items.name: Garlic Bread
items.description: Stone-baked bread brushed with garlic butter, warm and crispy every time.

items.name: Garlic Bread with Mozzarella
items.description: Warm garlic bread crowned with melted mozzarella for pure indulgence.

items.name: Apple Crumble
items.description: Spiced apple crumble served warm with custard or ice cream.

items.name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
items.description: Gooey chocolate brownie, ideal with custard or ice cream.

items.name: Sticky Toffee Pudding
items.description: Rich sponge pudding in toffee sauce, perfect with custard.

items.name: Ice Cream Sundae
items.description: Three scoops of ice cream with chocolate or strawberry sauce.

items.name: Chocolate Sauce
items.description: Silky chocolate sauce for drizzling or dipping.

items.name: Strawberry Sauce
items.description: Sweet strawberry drizzle for ice cream.

items.name: Toffee Sauce
items.description: Rich toffee sauce with brown sugar sweetness.

items.name: Balsamic Dressing
items.description: Classic balsamic dressing to brighten salads.

items.name: Americano

items.name: Hot Chocolate

items.name: Individual Pot of Tea
items.description: Tetley Tea, Decaffeinated, Earl gray, Green Tea, Green Tea with Lemon, Mint Fusion, Raspberry Pomegranate
